title: Douglas County Fair
description: The annual Douglas County Fair in Castle Rock, Colorado.
placeName: Douglas County Fairgrounds, 301 Wilcox St, Castle Rock, Colorado 80104, United States

title: Wine Tasting
description: While the practice of wine tasting is as ancient as its production, a more formalized methodology has slowly become established from the 14th century onwards. Modern, professional wine tasters (such as sommeliers or buyers for retailers) use a constantly evolving specialized terminology which is used to describe the range of perceived flavors, aromas and general characteristics of a wine.
